resources.string: The measurement requires a SCN-labeled SIM card. Please insert your SIM card before proceed.

"We use Location Service to provide more accurate core network measurement and other related service. Granting the permission of the location service will help us improve our service. We will upload anonymized and fused location data to our encrypted server for post-analysis to better network experience."
The core functionality relies on location to provide better cellular network experience. Disabling the location service will result in missing in functionality.
"We use Location Service to provide core functionalities in this measurement tool. Disabling location service will result in missing in functionality."
The tests rely on a cellular network with good connection. Please enable cellular data and then proceed the tests.
An error occurred when testing connection speed. We have recorded the error and will fix it in future updates.
